mapper.sql: id, parentId, version, code, name, remarks, sortNum, is_Enable, is_Delete, ownerId, createId, updateId, createTime, updateTime,opererType,opererContent
mapper.insert: insert into tb_syslogs (id, parentId, version, code, name, remarks, sortNum, is_Enable, is_Delete, ownerId, createId, updateId, createTime, updateTime, opererType, opererContent) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_Enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{is_Delete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opererType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opererContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_syslogs set parentId = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, version = version+1, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortNum = #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_Enable = #{is_Enable,jdbcType=BIT}, is_Delete = #{is_Delete,jdbcType=BIT}, ownerId = #{ownerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updateId = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, opererType = #{opererType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opererContent = #{opererContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update tb_syslogs set is_Delete = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
